articles.title: Apple orders 4nm chip production for future Macs - Micky News
articles.description: New reports reveal that Apple has ordered the production of its chips for upcoming products, including Macs and iPhone 13. A long-time Apple supplier, TSMC, w
articles.content:
A long-time Apple supplier, TSMC, will soon start producing 4nm chips for future Macs and iPhones. DigiTimes initially shared the news.
The company is yet to come up with an official event this year… [+2627 chars]
